attributes.action: Not host the 2012 Olympics, allow the French to do so, and never host any Olympics again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even though our GDP is rising, we CANNOT afford to host the Olympics. 6th July 2005 was the day we failed, not won. London citizens have already been overtaxed for a project most of them didn't even approve, and now the Government plans to deduct money from the National Lottery! This is a needless, unbeneficial drain on London taxpayers and Lottery players, and it MUST be cancelled. Let the French, who finished the contest second, to host the Olympics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
